channel.title: Multisig on Padawan journey
channel.description: Recent content in Multisig on Padawan journey

item.title: XZC with 3 of 4 Multisignature
item.description: This post will show a step to setup (3⁄4) multisignature wallet and how to send transaction from it 0. Setup We will create multisignature address that will require 3/4 key when signing. - So you need to prepare 4 private key (We use 4 xzc-address/public-key when setup multisig address and 3⁄4 private key when sending a transaction). You can just create new address from your existing wallet or you can create new wallet or private key which not relate from your old wallet.
